ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Gold Platted Crappy Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Depends who you usually group with.  If you re with casters, then I agree.  But I m usually in all-melee or primarily melee groups.  With fights typically
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 10 Mar 2000, Eric Boller wrote:
>
> Who cares about the proc? Most weapons don't average
> more than 1 proc every 45 seconds or so anyway
> (contrary to most people's belief that they average 4
> or 5 procs per fight). The damage/delay is better

Depends who you usually group with. If you're with casters,
then I agree. But I'm usually in all-melee or primarily melee
groups. With fights typically lasting 3+ minutes, the weapons
*do* average 4-5 procs per fight. :) (I enjoy grouping with
casters too, but long melee fights makes the effect of my
songs more obvious so I can fine tune the mix better.)

> than the ykesha and ebw (not taking into account magic
> numbers and lower delay,etc). I guess I still don't
> see why you guys think it is crappy. Granted it is
> off a dragon and is only marginally better than your
> ykesh or ebw. However, unless you have a planar
> weapon I would consider this better. Anyway, anyone
> on Tunare who think this weapon is crappy--I will
> gladly take your crappy weapon!

If it looks like a plain old dagger, that makes it crappy in
my book. :)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
